de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.tiled

Class TmxMapLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.tiled.TmxParser
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.tiled.TmxMapLoader

  • public class TmxMapLoader
extends TmxParser
    An Loader for tmx files, loads a tmx and gives a TileMap

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDefaultMapping(java.lang.Class<? extends Tile> tileclass)
      Adds a default mapping - this class is used when no other mapping fits
      void addMapping(java.lang.Integer gid, java.lang.Class<? extends Tile> tileclass)
      Adds a mapping between a GID and a Tile Class The class must - be a subclass of "Tile" - and have an empty constructor (0 parameters) - and/or have an 1-parameter constructor for the properties ( 1 parameter = Hashmap ) if the class has an constructor with the properties-map this one is used, otherwise the empty constructor is used
      protected void handleTile(int gid, int layer, int posX, int posY, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> propertiesMap) 
      void parse()
      Starts parsing of the TMX file.
      TileMap start()
      Starts the parsing and returns the created map Throws TmxMapParsingException if the constructor is not found or an other parsing problem occured

    • Method Detail

      • addMapping

        public void addMapping(java.lang.Integer gid,
              java.lang.Class<? extends Tile> tileclass)
        Adds a mapping between a GID and a Tile Class The class must - be a subclass of "Tile" - and have an empty constructor (0 parameters) - and/or have an 1-parameter constructor for the properties ( 1 parameter = Hashmap ) if the class has an constructor with the properties-map this one is used, otherwise the empty constructor is used
        Parameters:
        gid -
        tileclass -

           throws TmxMapParsingException
